aka: ZEF : The Story of DIE ANTWOORD
this_title: ZEF - The Story of DIE ANTWOORD
trans_title: 南非反文化运动：回答乐队的故事
ZEF : The Story of DIE ANTWOORD
introduction: South African producer / director JON DAY spent the last 5 years making a documentary about the mysterious rap-rave group, DIE ANTWOORD. Art directed by surrealist photographer, ROGER BALLEN. Narrated by NINJA & ¥O-LANDI'S daughter, 16 JONES.南非制片人/导演JON DAY花了5年时间制作了一部关于神秘说唱乐队DIE ANTWOORD的纪录片。艺术指导为超现实主义摄影师，ROGER BALLEN。旁白:NINJA & ¥O-LANDI的女儿，16 JONES。
chinese_title: 南非反文化运动：回答乐队的故事
foreign_title: ZEF - The Story of DIE ANTWOORD
